content.question: Which of the following correctly ranks the average speed <math alttext="lowercase v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the molecules in states <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, lowercase v sub B, equals, lowercase v sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than, lowercase v sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="lowercase v sub C, is greater than, lowercase v sub B, which is greater than lowercase v sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, lowercase v sub A, equals, lowercase v sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than, lowercase v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="lowercase v sub B, is greater than, open parenthesis, lowercase v sub A, equals, lowercase v sub C, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, lowercase v sub A, equals, lowercase v sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than, lowercase v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>ν</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
